hmm, official packages won't install anything to /usr/local/.  Stuff usually ends up in there through some "./configure; make; make install" dance

sometimes authors will provide an "uninstall" rule, so you can try « make uninstall » in the same place you ran « make install ».  Otherwise just use rm in /usr/local/ (this is easy if all you have in there is gstreamer :))
